messages.title: STAND UP FOR WHAT MATTERS
messages.content: This election isn't about the next 5 years – it's about the next 50 years. The Green Party is offering real opposition to the Government's extreme Brexit. We have the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country – and our place in the world. The Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: an economy that works for all

issues.brexitEurope: The Green Party is offering real opposition to the Government's extreme Brexit.
issues.economy: Ron regularly raises issues about how global warming is affecting our children and the future of our planet.
issues.education: Ron is determined to protect the NHS from being sold to foreign investors for profit rather than for the health of the nation and would promote legislation to address mental health issues, both short term and long term, through appropriate training in our education system.
issues.environment: Ron regularly raises issues about how global warming is affecting our children and the future of our planet.
issues.governance: He is concerned about the excessive UK debt the Tory government has built up which could send the UK towards bankruptcy if the Brexit negotiations go wrong.
issues.health: Ron is determined to protect the NHS from being sold to foreign investors for profit rather than for the health of the nation.

housing.content: Every Green vote on 8 June will help make that vision a reality.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ron Meldrum is delighted to be standing in Eastleigh again giving people the opportunity to elect a Green MP. He has supported Green issues since the age of 18.

quotes.text: He supports local businesses for local people and wants to see the tax system simplified and overhauled so that everyone pays their fair share.

images.caption: Leaflets with images of RON MELDRUM and Green Party campaign messages.
